Regulation Name(s): Multipurpose system for in vitro coagulation studies
Analyte(s): Proteins induced by vitamin K antagonists (PIVKA)
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Orthogonal regression of LogINR vs LogPT
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for HemosIL INR Validate quality control, HemosIL ISI Calibrate plasma calibrators, and ISIweb web software for monitoring and calibrating INR and PT on IL coagulation analyzers.
Indications for Use Summary: HemosIL INR Validate is a tri-level control for monitoring INR accuracy; HemosIL ISI Calibrate is a four-level plasma calibrator for ISI and MNPT calibration; ISIweb Software provides web-based calculation and verification of PT/INR results with designated reagents and IL coagulation systems.
